changeSet.author: rgalante
changeSet.comment: migrating existing deployable roles and permissions with context to restrictions
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, context_id, action, v) SELECT TAMW_permission.id AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, TAMW_permission.context_id AS context_id, 'ALL', 0 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_role.deployable = '1' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id AND TAMW_permission.context_id IS NOT NULL;
UPDATE TAMW_restriction SET permission_id = (SELECT permission_id FROM TAMW_restriction WHERE id = 1)
